titleStmt.title: An express from the knights and gentlemen now engaged with Sir George Booth to the city and citizens of London, and all other free-men of England.
titleStmt.author: Delamer, George Booth, Baron, 1622-1684.

notesStmt.note: Included at foot: "Sir George Booth to a friend of his in London" (dated Manchester Aug. 9. 1659).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
